entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:51 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 6:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and local snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and local snow squalls ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
